data.comment: The match is underway in Rome.
Free kick for Brescia in their own half.
In the minute 2, Jony for Lazio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Brescia have a goal kick.
Free kick for Brescia in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 5, Free kick Lazio.
Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Rome.
Luca Massimi signals a free kick to Brescia.
In the minute 8, Brescia's Sandro Tonali is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Brescia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Luca Massimi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Ernesto Torregrossa (Brescia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Brescia have been awarded a corner by Luca Massimi.
In the minute 10, Brescia's Ernesto Torregrossa attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Luca Massimi awards Lazio a goal kick.
Luca Massimi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Brescia drive upfield and Florian Aye gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lazio defender.
Corner awarded to Brescia.
Brescia pushes forward through Jaromir Zmrhal, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 13, In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lazio's Ciro Immobile breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Brescia goal kick.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Joaquin Correa.
In the minute 17, Ciro Immobile instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Brescia in the half of Lazio.
Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Nikolas Spalek gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brescia.
Brescia have been awarded a corner by Luca Massimi.
Joaquin Correa (Lazio) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Brescia at Stadio Olimpico.
Corner awarded to Brescia.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
In the minute 24, Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Luca Massimi signals a free kick to Brescia in their own half.
In the minute 29, Luca Massimi awards Brescia a goal kick.
In Rome Lazio attack through Jony. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Lazio.
Luca Massimi signals a Brescia throw-in in Lazio's half.
Brescia have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Brescia are coming forward and Jaromir Zmrhal gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Luca Massimi awards Lazio a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
